data.text: Terrible reception customer service, receptionist was incredibly rude to staff and when I approached the receptionist about her behaviour, she continued to be rude - really disappointed to receive this kind of treatment. Once again thank you for your valuable feedback and I do hope that this incident will not mere your decision to use our facilities and services and that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the very near future.
